name: Smasher (itch)
description:
Sorry if  there are any bugs, lags or glitches on the Mac version, I am not able to test it, but the windows version is fine! :D

-----------------About-------------------

A multiplayer game about smashing creatures and getting the highest score.  It's a online multiplayer game made with the knowledge of Blackthornprods online multiplayer udemy course. 

-------------------Controls-------------------

W A S D   to move

move around your cursor to rotate your hammer

---------------------Credits--------------------

made by Daniel Muenstermann

Assets used:

All In 1 Shader

Ultimate Sound FX Bundle

Wowie Game Jam Resource Pack
